bibl.title: Greek Ostraca in the Ashmolean Museum from Oxyrhynchus and Other Sites (O. Ashm. Shelton). (Papyrologica Florentina. XVII.)
bibl.note: O. Ashm. Shelton 1-229. Les Nos 83-190 constituent les archives de la distribution de vin à des participants aux courses de chars (Oxyrhynchus, IVe siècle).
Shelton John C. (edited with translations and notes by), Greek Ostraca in the Ashmolean Museum from Oxyrhynchus and Other Sites (O. Ashm. Shelton). (Papyrologica Florentina. XVII.)
